long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension tracks rolls on TRONbet.io ring and moon dapp and generate stats

Features:

RING:
- Shows 5x the history with 4 additional roll history columns (it populate over time)
- Show probability baseline and current above betting buttons
- Show delay and streak stats below betting buttons
- Have a badge that will show how long ago was GOLD roll
- Make a notification when GOLD rolls
- You will not lose stats by restarting chrome
- NEW stats offset filter (show stats for last 54, 108, 216, 532, 1064, 2128 or All rounds)

MOON:
- NEW Moon stats - percentage, delay and streak for each color
- NEW stats offset filter (show stats for last 50, 100, 200, 500, 1000, 2000 or All rounds)
- NEW Make a notification on 1000+ gold moon rounds

v0.0.5 changes:
Moved to alternate way of tracking ring rolls and moon rounds, now for script to work you must have game you want to track open all the time. 
This change is because TRONbet team hardened their systems and only way extension will track statistics for you.

Donate for further plugin development: TKMjoSjXNyD43aSGyuxSDFoEwV4x8YUyqZ

note: This is not perfect in any way or form, if you have any issues, ideas please reach out!
